Donna Chambers bụ onye America na-emepụta ọla na White Plains, New York
A maara ya màkà atụmatụ ndị na-egosi nkume pel na nné ochie nke chips ịgba chaa chaa pearl
Nnukwu ụlọ ahịa dị ka Bloomingdale's, Saks Fifth Avenue na Na Hoku na National Museum of African American History and Culture na Washington, DC ebutewo ọla Chambers.
Màkà ọtụtụ ógè okpomọkụ na mgbè ụlọ akwụkwọ gachara, ónyé na-emepụta ákwà Vera Neumann gọrọ Chambers dị afọ iri na ụma ka ọ kewaa agba màkà akwa ákwà silk

N'afọ 1968, Chambers natara ònyìnyé Vera Industries George Neumann Scholarship nke mbụ wee gaa Pratt Industries iji mụọ ihe ejiji. Chambers rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-enyere ónyé na-emepụta ejiji Oleg Cassini aka.
N'afọ 1990, Chambers meghere That Old Black Magic Book and Gift Gallery, ụlọ ahịa ònyìnyé Westchester, New York nke gosipụtara ihe ònyìnyé ndị Africa America, nka, kaadị ekele na akwụkwọ

E gosipụtara ọrụ nke ihe karịrị ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-emepụta ihe irí isé na ụlọ ahịa ahụ. Otu klọb akwụkwọ kwa ọnwa nke ụlọ ahịa ahụ kwadoro gosipụtara ọgụgụ Arthur Ashe, Nikki Giovanni, Bernice L
Al Sharpton, na Iyanla Vanzant. Ụlọ ahịa ahụ mechiri mgbe afọ iri abụo gasịrị.
